entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @Mike_Pence @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump This morning I read a tweet of someone who had to wait 28 days till she got her covid-19 test back. In Switzerland where I live we got the result 36h later. Trump turned the USA into a 3rd world country. #TrumpHatesScience #TrumpFailedAmerica #TrumpVirus
